item.title: Development Update #29
item.description: Summary: Its July. Meshnet was promised in July. Spec is done. Implementation in progress. We end up writing everything five times and refactoring it before its perfect. Sorry this takes so long. Summary of Skycoin Consensus Algorithm Research to Date We solved adversarial byzantine generals for full connected graphs with a: Cryptographicly constructed “public broadcast channel” with fully connected nodes, but solution does not scale to 300,000 nodes. -> global consensus must result from local consensus in practical system -> Proved global consensus from local consensus in random graphs using probabilistic Ben-Ors consensus process We have mathematical proof that 51% attack proof is achievable with a single trusted timestamping server.
